Core.Line: What are you doing here, Card?
Calm down, both of you. Card. We are leaving.
You cannot leave me behind like this.
How dare you speak. No matter Bookworm is here or not, I'm not letting you get away easily. If you want to leave, you have to challenge me, and defeat me.
This is not a threat. You need keys to leave this Middle of Nowhere. You can ask Bookworm if you have doubts.
You know but you don't tell me?
You need two keys. One is with me, and the other is in Card's hands. I just thought things could go better.
